attributes.action: to push for UN resolutions to mount an international aid effort in Burma/Myanmar using military force as required
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The world is standing back whilst the Burmese people die from the 2nd May cyclone. The international community had no problem going into Kosovo when people were being killed by their own government but stands by whilst the Burmese starve to death. Please don't treat Burma like another Rwanda and turn your backs again so you can keep Burma's key partners China and India on side. The human price of cheap imported goods is too high a price to pay.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
